text: Geoffrey Colin Barnett (16 October 1946 â€“ 15 January 2021) was an English footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He was born in Northwich, England. His playing career lasted from 1962 to 1980. He played for Everton, Arsenal and the Minnesota Kicks. Barnett died on 15 January 2021 at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Arsenal F.C. players Category:Everton F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Cheshire Category:English football managers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Florida
title: Geoff Barnett (footballer)
